biotools.summary: A database of DNA binding specificities for Drosophila transcription factors determined using the bacterial one-hybrid system. The database provides to recognition motifs and position weight matrices for TFs. Search tools and flat file downloads are provided to retrieve binding site information for individual TFs, groups of TFs or for all TFs with characterized binding specificities.
